SEARCH
Package Project

Class ProjectRepo

java.lang.Object
Project.ProjectRepo
public class ProjectRepo extends Object
Repository class for managing a collection of HDB housing projects. Handles reading from and writing to a CSV file that stores project information.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProjectRepo()
    Constructor that initializes the project repository and loads existing project data from file.

  • Method Details

    • saveProjects

      public void saveProjects()
      Saves all project data to the CSV file, overwriting existing contents.

    • getProject

      public Project getProject(String name)
      Retrieves a project by name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the project
      Returns:
      the corresponding Project object, or null if not found

    • addProject

      public void addProject(Project newProject)
      Adds a new project to the repository.
      Parameters:
      newProject - the Project object to add

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject(String name)
      Removes a project from the repository by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the project to remove

    • getProjectListings

      public HashMap<String,Project> getProjectListings()
      Returns the current list of all projects.
      Returns:
      a HashMap containing all project listings

    • filterByAvailUnitType

      public ArrayList<Project> filterByAvailUnitType(Flat.Type flatType)
      Filters projects that are visible, within the application date range, and have available units of the specified flat type.
      Parameters:
      flatType - the flat type to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of matching projects

    • filterForResApplication

      public ArrayList<Project> filterForResApplication(ArrayList<String> blacklist, Flat.Type flatType)
      Filters projects for residential applications by excluding blacklisted projects and including only those with available units of the specified flat type.
      Parameters:
      blacklist - list of project names to exclude
      flatType - the flat type to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of filtered projects suitable for application

    • filterForTeamApplication

      public ArrayList<Project> filterForTeamApplication(HdbOfficer officer)
      Filters projects for team applications by a specific officer. Excludes blacklisted projects and those that overlap with the officer's current assignment.
      Parameters:
      officer - the HdbOfficer applying for team projects
      Returns:
      a list of projects suitable for the officer's application

    • filterByVisibility

      public ArrayList<Project> filterByVisibility()
      Filters and returns only the projects that are marked as visible.
      Returns:
      a list of visible projects

    • listToString

      public static String listToString(ArrayList<String> list)
      Converts a list of strings to a single CSV-compatible string with quotes.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of strings to convert
      Returns:
      a CSV-formatted string with elements joined by comma and surrounded by quotes

    • stringToList

      public static ArrayList<String> stringToList(String input)
      Converts a CSV-formatted string into a list of strings. Trims whitespace and removes empty elements.
      Parameters:
      input - the input string to convert
      Returns:
      a list of individual string elements
